author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tricycles, sewing machines and household appliances were distributed to more than 100 disabled people on Sunday. At a function organised by Lions Club International (324-A8) at Dr. MGR Janaki Matriculation in Saligramam, Justice (retired) T.N. Vallinayagam and V. Vanitha, DIG, Coastal Security Group, were present and handed over the aid to the disabled, a press release said. K. Gopinath, district chairperson for the welfare of physically challenged and district governor Vitto Placka were present. Awards were also handed over to those who had extended service to the disabled

—Staff Reporter
title: Appliances for the disabled
